name: R4B-HumanName-R5-HumanName
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B HumanName into FHIR R5

element.display: Name of a human - parts and usage

target.display: Name of a human or other living entity - parts and usage
target.comment: R4B `HumanName` maps as Equivalent to R5 `HumanName`
R4B `HumanName.extension` maps as Equivalent to R5 `HumanName.extension`
R4B `HumanName.family` maps as Equivalent to R5 `HumanName.family`

element.display: Given names (not always 'first'). Includes middle names

target.display: Given names (not always 'first'). Includes middle names
target.comment: R4B `HumanName.given` maps as Equivalent to R5 `HumanName.given`
R4B `HumanName.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `HumanName.id`

element.display: Time period when name was/is in use

target.display: Time period when name was/is in use
target.comment: R4B `HumanName.period` maps as Equivalent to R5 `HumanName.period`

element.display: Parts that come before the name

target.display: Parts that come before the name
target.comment: R4B `HumanName.prefix` maps as Equivalent to R5 `HumanName.prefix`

element.display: Parts that come after the name

target.display: Parts that come after the name
target.comment: R4B `HumanName.suffix` maps as Equivalent to R5 `HumanName.suffix`

element.display: Text representation of the full name

target.display: Text representation of the full name
target.comment: R4B `HumanName.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `HumanName.text`

element.display: usual | official | temp | nickname | anonymous | old | maiden

target.display: usual | official | temp | nickname | anonymous | old | maiden
target.comment: R4B `HumanName.use` maps as Equivalent to R5 `HumanName.use` - use has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/name-use|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/name-use|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
